name: WhichCraft?
description:
WhichCraft? is a point and click narrative based game. The story revolves around a witch, knight, goblin and a skeleton. The witch(player) has to make a decision for each of the senarios that occur. You have the choice on how these strangers lives will turn out. Will you change the world for the better or you be creating chaos?

The only controls you have for the game is a mouse or touchpad. You will only need to click on what you want or to progress the dialog.

Artists:

Ellie Aas

Logan Webster

Programmers:

Rebecca Denna

Jacob Fischer

Elliot Klenk
